DOC.brief_summary: Patient charts will be reviewed to evaluate the incidence of intraocular pressure spikes while on Loteprednol etabonate ophthalmic suspension 0.5%, Loteprednol etabonate (0.5%) and tobramycin (0.3%)
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Evaluation of the Intraocular Pressure Spikes With Loteprednol and Loteprednol/Tobramycin
DOC.criteria: Any patient who experienced an IOP spike while using Lotemax or Zylet will be included
